remarks: Transfer two terms of an addtraction in an equality.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Feb-2020.)
statement:
addeqxfrd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addeqxfrd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addeqxfrd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
addeqxfrd.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
addeqxfrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = ( C + D ) ) $.
addeqxfrd $p |- ( ph -> ( A - D ) = ( C - B ) ) $.
